seo.title: Forgot Password - Paris 2024 Olympic Ticketing
seo.description: Page to reset your password to access your Paris 2024 Ticketing account.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot your password?
forgotPassword.description: Enter the email address associated with your account to receive a password reset link.
forgotPassword.successMessage: A reset email has been sent to your email address. Please check your inbox.
forgotPassword.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
